author: Ivan Pereira
title: Construction unions call for better safety, health protections during pandemic
description: Union leaders and public health experts say construction workers need health and financial protection as they continue to work sites during the pandemic.
content:
Working in construction during the coronavirus pandemic has split the industry down the middle, according to advocates and health experts.
On one hand, buildings, roads and utilities need regular maintenance and upgrades, and millions of blue-collar workers … [+4449 chars]
